Dialogue.Page: Dreambound is the mod that won first place in the fourth mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community. The mod introduces itself by showing a mirage of the Ringed Planet around Giant's Deep.
Dreambound's central mechanic revolves around a device that can scan and point to several objects in order to find them, and with it you can uncover an untold story of the Stranger's Inhabitants.
The mod does a great job at conveying information to the player with minimal text, and has really proven itself worthy of first prize.
